channel.title: Server Freezes every 4 / 5 Mins
channel.description:
Ok, well i have posted this before but it has been some time, lol
Well... Every 4/5 mins, my server freezes for around 4 mins and IP bans everyone who isnt staff. I Have tried removing it through server.java but it made no difference.
I am using PK Planet V3 and Pk Planet Client V6/7 I Am not advertising lol, i thought this may help.
-Thanks :)
